伊達: (だて) - elegance/dandyism/sophistication/having style; affectation/showing off/putting on an air/appearances/just for show
伊達の薄着: (だてのうすぎ) - wearing light clothes for the sake of fashion
伊達メガネ: (だてメガネ) - (yoji) glasses for show; fashionable eyeglasses worn for appearance's sake; glasses with no lenses or 'window glass' lenses
伊達巻: (だてまき) - (woman's) undersash; rolled omelette mixed with fish (paste) (omelet)
伊達巻き: (だてまき) - (woman's) undersash; rolled omelette mixed with fish (paste) (omelet)
伊達眼鏡: (だてめがね) - (yoji) glasses for show; fashionable eyeglasses worn for appearance's sake; glasses with no lenses or 'window glass' lenses

伊達締め: (だてじめ) - small, thin fabric belt worn over the kimono and under the obi in order to protect the fabric
伊達衆: (だてしゅう) - dandy; gallant; chivalrous person
伊邪那岐命: (いざなきのみこと) - Izanagi; male deity who fathered Japan and the sun, moon, and storm gods
伊邪那美命: (いざなみのみこと) - Izanami; female deity who gave birth to Japan and the sun, moon, and storm gods
伍す: (ごす) - to rank with; to rank among
伍する: (ごする) - to rank with; to rank among
伍を重ねる: (ごをかさねる) - to double the ranks
伎倆: (ぎりょう) - ability; competency; talent; skill; capacity
伎癢: (ぎよう) - itching to show off one's abilities
伏し倒れる: (ふしたおれる) - to fall down
伏し拝む: (ふしおがむ) - to kneel and worship
伏す: (ふす) - to bend down/to bow down/to prostrate oneself; to hide oneself
伏する: (ふくする) - to crouch/to stoop/to bend down/to prostrate oneself/to lie down; to yield/to submit/to surrender; to hide/to conceal oneself
伏せる: (ふせる) - to lay something upside down/to turn something over/to lay something face down; to cover/to lay (pipes)/to lay (an ambush)/to hide/to conceal
伏せ字: (ふせじ) - symbol used in place of a censored word (e.g. blank, circle, X, asterisk); (later printed as 〓) turn (in set-type proofing)/upside-down character
伏せ長: (ふせなが) - going (e.g. of a flight of stairs); length
伏兵: (ふくへい) - ambush; troops in ambush
伏在: (ふくざい) - lying concealed; being hidden
伏奏: (ふくそう) - report to the throne
伏字: (ふせじ) - symbol used in place of a censored word (e.g. blank, circle, X, asterisk); (later printed as 〓) turn (in set-type proofing)/upside-down character
伏水: (ふくすい) - water gone underground (to emerge as a spring)
伏竜: (ふくりゅう) - suicide divers (part of the Japanese Special Attack Units during WWII)
伏竜鳳雛: (ふくりょうほうすう) - (yoji) gifted young person who shows much promise; unrecognized genius; great person whose talent is hidden under a bushel
伏罪: (ふくざい) - penal servitude/submitting to a sentence/pleading guilty; (伏罪 only)  undetected crime
伏角: (ふくかく) - dip (angle that the direction of a compass needle makes with the horizon)
伏越し: (ふせこし) - inverted siphon; siphon culvert
伏鉢: (ふくばち) - fukubachi (inverted bowl-shaped part of a pagoda finial)
伏長: (ふせなが) - going (e.g. of a flight of stairs); length
伏魔殿: (ふくまでん) - abode of demons; hotbed (of graft); pandemonium
伏龍: (ふくりゅう) - suicide divers (part of the Japanese Special Attack Units during WWII)
伐つ: (うつ) - to strike; to attack; to punish
伐り出す: (きりだす) - (切り出す, 切出す, 伐り出す only) to quarry/to cut (timber)/to cut and carry off; (切り出す, 切出す only) to begin to talk/to break the ice/to broach; (切り出す, 切出す, 鑽り出す only) to start a fire (with flint, by rubbing sticks together, etc.); (切り出す, 切出す, 伐り出す only) to select and extract (from a media file)/to splice out
伐採: (bassai) - derrubando madeira, cortando árvores, extração de madeira, madeireira
休けい: (きゅうけい) - rest; break; recess; intermission
休す: (きゅうす) - to come to an end; to rest
休する: (きゅうする) - to come to an end; to rest
休ませる: (やすませる) - to excuse (someone); to give a holiday to; to make (someone) rest
休まる: (やすまる) - to be rested; to feel at ease; to repose; to be relieved
休み: (yasumi) - descanso, intervalo, alívio; férias, feriado, ausência, suspensão; descanso, intervalo, alívio; férias, feriado, ausência, suspensão; dormência (de um bicho-da-seda antes da muda)
休みなく: (やすみなく) - without rest; tirelessly; incessantly
休みボケ: (やすみボケ) - sluggishness after few days off
休み中: (やすみちゅう) - closed; on break; private party
休み休み: (やすみやすみ) - resting at times; (used reproachfully) with careful thought/after proper consideration
休み所: (やすみどころ) - resting place; haven of rest
休み明け: (やすみあけ) - just after a holiday break; the first day after the holidays
休み時間: (やすみじかん) - recess; break time; break between classes; free period; recess time; recreation hour; time for recess
休み茶屋: (やすみじゃや) - wayside teahouse; tea house used as a resting place
休む: (やすむ) - to be absent/to take a day off; to rest/to have a break; to go to bed/to (lie down to) sleep/to turn in/to retire; to stop doing some ongoing activity for a time/to suspend business
休める: (やすめる) - to rest; to suspend; to give relief
休らう: (やすらう) - to rest; to relax
